#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int n,i,x,y;
	cin >> n;
	if(n == 0)
		cout << "1" << endl;
	else if(n == 1)
		cout << "0" << endl;
	else
	{
		x = n / 2;
		if(n % 2 == 0)
		{
			for(i = 0;i < x;i++)
				cout << "8";
		}
		else
		{
			cout << "4";
			for(i = 0;i < x;i++)
				cout << "8";
		}
		cout << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
